item.content:encoded:
This week it seems like everyone wants to know what other people can see on their Facebook page and who’s been stalking them on Facebook. Then, it got really creepy. Also, Ray and Tom launch a new segment called, well, they don’t know what to call it. If you have an idea, leave it in the comments down below. Make sure to subscribe to the show, and leave a review!

If you have a tech question for Deemable Tech call us, leave us a voice-mail at 904-372-3336.

Subscribe to the show in iTunes by clicking here.

Subscribe to the show in another podcast reader by clicking here.

Deemable Tech – Episode 16 – We Took The Lollipop

Today’s Questions:

  • Can someone that I have friended on Facebook see my profile if they haven’t answered my friend request?
  • When is my USB thumb drive going to die?
  • What is a better way for my friend and I to collaborate on documents and spreadsheets?
  • I keep getting collection calls for someone else on my phone? Is there an app that will block them?
  • What’s the best external hard drive?

Need tech help? Got a problem or tech question about your computer, phone or tablet? Give us a call and leave us a voice mail at 904-372-DEEM (3336), or send us an email and questions@deemable.com. We’ll take the best questions and answer them on the show.

Debunkable

  • Now you can see who’s been stalking your Facebook page…or can you?
Had a friend forward you something from the Internet that seemed to good to be true? Gotten a crazy chain email from Aunt Thelma? Send it our way and we’ll take a look at it. Our email address is debunkable@deemable.com.

Links we mentioned on today’s show:

  • Take This Lollipop
  • Google Drive
  • Call Blocker by NQ Mobile
  • iBlacklist from Cydia
  • Fair Debt Collection Practices Act (FDCPA)
  • Federal Trade Commission
  • FTC Debt Collection FAQs’s website
  • ioSafe Rugged Portable
  • Western Digital My Passport
